sentences.english: One day Mrs. Slaton gave the class an assignment.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，斯莱顿夫人给全班同学布置了一项作业。

sentences.english: I scanned the sixty faces in my economics class at UNLV.
sentences.chinese: 我扫视了一下全班六十张脸。

sentences.english: One fall morning, the class was abuzz with excitment.
sentences.chinese: 一个秋天的上午，全班闹腾起来。

sentences.english: The news enfevered the whole class.
sentences.chinese: 这消息令全班同学极度兴奋。

sentences.english: I know that I was always scared to death of reading in front of the class.
sentences.chinese: 我以前最怕在全班同学面前朗读。

sentences.english: The teacher asked who had thrown the eraser,but the class clammed up.
sentences.chinese: 老师问是谁扔的黑板擦，但全班学生保持沉默。

sentences.english: Liu Hong is showing the class an old photo of her family.
sentences.chinese: 刘虹正在给全班看一张她家以前的全家福。

sentences.english: The whole students were laughing except David.
sentences.chinese: 除了大卫，全班同学都在笑。

sentences.english: I have learned English for three years, and has been the best in our class.
sentences.chinese: 已经学了三年英语，成绩一直名列全班第一。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith rapped on the board with his pointer to call the class to order.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生用教鞭敲着黑板要求全班安静。

sentences.english: The younger instructor stood in front of the students red with embarrassment, unable to broach the subject.
sentences.chinese: 小科代表害羞的红着脸站在全班同学面前，难以启齿。

sentences.english: His constant blunders made him the laughing-stock of the whole class.
sentences.chinese: 他总是出错，成了全班的笑柄。

sentences.english: In fact, in a number of courses I received the highest exam scores in the class.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，有好几门作业我滴成绩居全班第一。“”
我在使用“全班行动”教学策略吗？

sentences.english: Today, my college professor asked my entire class what a trapezoid was.
sentences.chinese: 今天大学的教授问全班同学梯形是什么玩意。

sentences.english: He was an outstanding pupil and, ipso facto, disliked by the rest of the.
sentences.chinese: 他是优秀学生，正因为这个缘故，全班都不喜欢他。

definition: teacher in charge of a class
to study at the same school/fellow student/classmate/CL:位[wei4],個|个[ge4]
the prettiest girl in the class
to divide people into groups, teams, squads etc
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
to be in the same class/to be in the same squad/classmate
